fullText: This revival of The Who's Tommy brings fresh energy to the rock opera, with stunning choreography and a powerhouse cast that makes Pete Townshend's music soar in ways that feel both nostalgic and completely contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of The Who's Tommy brings fresh energy to the rock opera, with stunning choreography and a powerhouse cast that makes Pete Townshend's music soar in ways that feel both nostalgic and completely contemporary.
